title: New Terraform integrations with ServiceNow, GitHub, Confluent, VMware, Cisco, and more
content:
As our HashiCorp Terraform ecosystem continues to expand, we welcome new integrations that provide additional options to Terraform Cloud, Enterprise, and Community edition users as they deploy and manage their cloud and on-premises infrastructure. Terraform is the world’s most widely used multi-cloud provisioning product. Whether you're deploying to Amazon Web Services (AWS), Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud, other clouds, or an on-premises datacenter, Terraform can be a single control plane, using infrastructure as code for infrastructure automation to provision and manage your entire infrastructure.

Terraform Cloud

HashiCorp announces five new Terraform Cloud integrations:

Confluent

Confluent is a fully managed, cloud-native data-streaming platform for improved Kafka performance, scalability, and security. Confluent published Confluent Sentinel Policies for Terraform for Terraform Cloud/Enterprise users to establish an initial policy as code framework while onboarding new and additional use cases in Confluent.

GitHub

Founded in 2007, GitHub has brought millions of developers together to discover, share, and build better software. The Github Actions and pipeline template for Terraform Cloud implements CI/CD pipelines best practices with Terraform Cloud.

GitLab

GitLab is an open source end-to-end software development platform with built-in version control, issue tracking, code review, and CI/CD pipelines. The GitLab Pipeline template for Terraform Cloud implements CI/CD pipelines best practices with Terraform Cloud.

Orca Security

Orca Security is a Cloud Security Platform that identifies, prioritizes, and remediates security risks and compliance issues. The Orca Security Terraform Run Task enables organizations to embed comprehensive cloud security checks into their CI/CD process by leveraging the Orca CLI to automatically run critical security and compliance checks using over 100+ different governance frameworks and custom policies, as well as surface findings in both native development tooling as well as the Orca Security Platform UI.

ServiceNow

ServiceNow offers solutions for IT service and operations management, employee and customer experience teams, low-code automation, and more. The ServiceNow Service Graph Connector for Terraform Cloud and Enterprise automatically and securely updates the ServiceNow Configuration Management Database (CMDB) with the infrastructure state and resources provisioned by Terraform.

Terraform providers

Announcing 10 new verified Terraform providers from our partners:

Abbey Labs

Abbey Labs streamlines data access and frees engineers to focus on core responsibilities, without compromising security and compliance. The Abbey Terraform provider enables Terraform to manage Abbey code deployments.

Chainguard

Chainguard, a startup that focuses on securing software supply chains, released four new Terraform providers: The APKO Terraform provider for container orchestration, the Cosign Terraform provider for security and authentication, the OCI Terraform provider for container orchestration, and the KO Terraform provider for CI/CD pipelines.

Cisco Systems

Cisco delivers software-defined networking, cloud, and security solutions to help transform your business. The Cisco Systems IOS-XR Terraform provider provides Terraform management for resources running the IOS-XR network operating system.

Control Plane

Control Plane abstracts various hyper scalers, allowing developers to mix and match the services of AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure. Control Plane exposes all its objects via the Control Plane Terraform provider, allowing DevOps engineers to treat multiple environments as one virtual cloud. Rather than having to deal with the complexities of VPCs, routing tables, Kubernetes, Istio, Grafana, Prometheus, etc. developers can focus on functionality and layering their infrastructure as code using Terraform.

OpsLevel

OpsLevel provides engineering teams with one place to fix, build, and release high-quality code without operational toil, improving speed and standards with the OpsLevel developer portal. The OpsLevel integration with Terraform enables its platform to be managed with Terraform code.

SingleStore

SingleStore is an all-in-one database for operational analytics and AI/ML-powered applications that requires fast data ingest, high performance. The SingleStore Terraform Provider automates Singlestore code implementation.

VMware

VMware software provides a completely virtualized set of hardware to the guest operating system. The Terraform provider for VMware Cloud Foundation can be used with Terraform to work with VMware Cloud Foundation.

Learn more about Terraform integrations

All integrations are available for review in our HashiCorp Terraform Registry. To verify an existing integration, please refer to our Terraform Cloud Integration Program.

If you haven’t already, try the free tier of Terraform Cloud to help simplify your Terraform workflows and management.
author: Nicole Bahr
